format:
This site can be accessed from outside the DHI network on public internet as hydra.dhi-wasy-de/femonitor/ (include trailing /) Embed the following code in you femfile (adapt the channel number) to send updates to this site:
import os
import platform
import urllib.request
import urllib.parse

channel = 1  # set channel to post status updates
top_level_url =  "http://demuc1-pld1.dhi.dk:1881/api"
watchdog_url = "http://demuc1-pld1.dhi.dk:1881/api/watchdog"

def log_on(user, password):
    # provide credentials
    password_mgr = urllib.request.HTTPPasswordMgrWithDefaultRealm()
    password_mgr.add_password(None, top_level_url, user, password)
    handler = urllib.request.HTTPBasicAuthHandler(password_mgr)
    opener = urllib.request.build_opener(handler)
    opener.open(watchdog_url)
    urllib.request.install_opener(opener)

def watchdog(action="feed", channel=0,
             timestep=0, simtime=0, step_length=0.712 ):
    # call API
    params={"channel" : channel,
     "action" : action,
     "timestep": doc.getNumberOfTimeSteps(),
     "simtime" : doc.getAbsoluteSimulationTime(),
     "step_length" : doc.getCurrentTimeIncrement(),
     "hostname" : platform.node(),
     "modelname" : os.path.basename(doc.getProblemPath())
    }
    url_values = urllib.parse.urlencode(params)
    full_url = watchdog_url + '?' + url_values
    data = urllib.request.urlopen(full_url)
    return data

def preSimulation(doc):
    print("log into watchdog")
    log_on("username", "password")
    
    print("waking watchdog...")
    watchdog(channel=channel, action="wake")
    
def postTimeStep(doc):
    print("feeding watchdog")
    watchdog(channel=channel, action="feed")
    
def postSimulation(doc):
    print("watchdog sleeping...")
    watchdog(channel=channel, action="sleep")
